newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - St George cuts fixed rate home loans.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - St George cuts fixed rate home loans.

text.p: St George Bank Ltd said it has reduced its range of fixed rate home loans by up to 1.0 percent following recent movements in the bond market.
St George said it is offering the lowest three and five year fixed home loan rates at 8.75 percent per annum for three years and 8.95 percent per annum for five years.
Effective August 26, the new low rates are available to both owner occupiers and investor borrowers, St George said.
The bank said its variable rate home loan is currently 8.5 percent per annum.
